params.name: bboxes
params.description: The bounding bboxes associated to texts.

params.name: num_image_tokens
params.description: The number of (consecutive) places that are used to mark the placeholders to store image information.This should be the same as latent_query_num in the instance of Kosmos2Config you are using.

params.name: first_image_token_id
params.description: The token id that will be used for the first place of the subsequence that is reserved to store imageinformation. If unset, will default to self.tokenizer.unk_token_id + 1.

params.name: add_eos_token
params.description: Whether or not to include EOS token id in the encoding when add_special_tokens=True.
